scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install-server && npm run install-client && npm run build
scripts.develop: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
scripts.start: npm i concurrently && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run server" "npm run start --prefix client"
